728344f-a.title: Richmond: Arc Place - Tysens Lane
728344f-a.folder: Arc Place & Tysens Lane, Staten Island, NY

728345f-a.title: Richmond: Arc Place - Tysens Lane
728345f-a.text:
Arc Place (formerly Amboy Road), at the N.W. corner of Tysens
Lane, showing the old Britton House. It was built between 1650 and
1660 and demolished in 1896, being one of the oldest structures on
Staten IIsland. It was used as a Colonial court house. It was also
used as a hospital by the British during the Revolution.
Prior to 1896.
By Wm. T. Davis
through P.  L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
